title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\QueryParameters
name: QueryParameters
description:
Represents the parameters of the conversational query.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.QueryParameters

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.time_zone
params.description: The time zone of this conversational query from the time zone database, e.g., America/New_York, Europe/Paris. If not provided, the time zone specified in agent settings is used.

params.name: data.geo_location
params.description: The geo location of this conversational query.

params.name: data.contexts
params.description: The collection of contexts to be activated before this query is executed.

params.name: data.reset_contexts
params.description: Specifies whether to delete all contexts in the current session before the new ones are activated.

params.name: data.session_entity_types
params.description: Additional session entity types to replace or extend developer entity types with. The entity synonyms apply to all languages and persist for the session of this query.

params.name: data.payload
params.description: This field can be used to pass custom data to your webhook. Arbitrary JSON objects are supported. If supplied, the value is used to populate the WebhookRequest.original_detect_intent_request.payload field sent to your webhook.

params.name: data.sentiment_analysis_request_config
params.description: Configures the type of sentiment analysis to perform. If not provided, sentiment analysis is not performed.
